ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 (8 ounce) package KRAFT Shredded Low-Moisture Part-Skim Mozzarella Cheese
¼ cup finely chopped green peppers

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for smooth mixing
Low-moisture mozzarella prevents the spread from becoming watery
Chop pepperoni finely so it distributes evenly throughout
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is essentially a pizza-flavored cheese dip. Would you like suggestions for vegetable additions or other ways to customize it?
